attributes.review: this app- without my consent- installed a virus into my phone and began tracking me. the app doesn’t not work properly and has hundreds of bugs that need to be fixed. the graphics are horrible and there seems to be some kind of orange tint on all the images of gonald rump and no one else. strange. will not be reinstalling.
attributes.title: horrible app, hundreds of bugs and tapped my phone
